category-def.name: info.evanchik.eclipse.karaf
category-def.label: Eclipse Integration for Apache Felix Karaf
category-def.description: Core functionality required to integrate Apache Felix Karaf family of application servers inside the Eclipse IDE.

category-def.name: info.evanchik.eclipse.smk
category-def.label: Eclipse Integration for Apache ServiceMix Kernel
category-def.description: Functionality required to execute application server distributions based on Apache ServiceMix Kernel
